title: Failure in Fantasy Football Helped Sports Gambling (Podcast)
itunes:title: Failure in Fantasy Football Helped Sports Gambling (Podcast)
description:
It was a jam-packed weekend for American sports, as the NFL's first week coincided with NBA and NHL playoff action, MLB, and U.S. Open tennis finals. Jason Kelly, Michael Barr, and Mike Lynch speak with a veteran of sports gambling, Steve Budin, Chief Executive Officer of Sportsinfo.com. They discuss the impact the pandemic has had on the industry, the outlook for the professional and college football seasons, and the potential e-sports has for the future of legal gambling.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
